What are the key features of NETA V50?
responses: The Neta V50 is a feature-packed electric vehicle with a remarkable NEDC range of three hundred eighty kilometers. It accelerates from zero to fifty kilometers per hour in under three point nine seconds. The vehicle comes with an eight-year or one hundred fifty thousand kilometers warranty on the battery and motor. Charging from thirty percent to eighty percent takes just twenty minutes with a forty point seven kW DC fast charger.

The NETA V50 has a spacious design with dimensions of four thousand seventy millimeters in length, one thousand six hundred ninety millimeters in width, and one thousand five hundred forty millimeters in height. It offers a ground clearance of one hundred seventy millimeters and a trunk capacity of three hundred thirty-five liters. The vehicle features leather seats and advanced interior controls, including a twelve-inch screen instrument.

Key highlights of the NETA V50 include its forty point seven kWh CATL (LFP) battery, a fifty kW electric motor delivering one hundred twenty Newton meters of torque. It also features several safety technologies, such as dual front airbags, ABS+EBD, ESC, and Hill-Start Assist Control.

The NETA V50 is equipped with advanced safety features, energy-saving options like a HEPA N95 air filter, and stylish exterior elements such as LED daytime running lights, alloy wheels, and a high-mounted stop lamp. These features ensure a premium driving experience.

With a five-passenger capacity, a high-strength steel safecage body, and features like electronic hydraulic braking (EHB) and tire pressure monitoring system (TPMS), the NETA V50 is designed for performance, safety, and comfort.

The NETA V50 offers advanced charging capabilities, including eight-hour AC home charging from zero to one hundred percent and a CCS2 body-integrated charge socket. Its safety and convenience features include parking sensors, a backup camera, and an electronic parking brake (EPB).

responses: The Neta X is a modern and sporty SUV with an impressive NEDC range of five hundred kilometers and a top speed of one hundred fifty kilometers per hour. It offers advanced safety features, including six airbags and seventy-five percent high-strength steel construction.

The Neta X comes with a battery capacity of fifty-two kWh or sixty-two kWh and a motor power of one hundred kW, delivering a smooth and powerful driving experience. It also offers a ground clearance of one hundred eighty-five millimeters and a spacious double-decker trunk.

The Neta X is available in stylish exterior colors like White, Black, Blue, Gray, and Brown. Inside, it features a soft and comfortable interior with eighty percent soft leather. It combines luxury and sportiness for an exceptional driving experience.

Key highlights of the Neta X include a verified mileage of one point six million kilometers, high-strength steel construction for safety, and an ultra-long wheelbase that provides superior stability on the road.

This sporty SUV supports fast charging, allowing you to charge from thirty to eighty percent in just thirty minutes. It's equipped with a one hundred kW motor and offers exceptional safety with six airbags and advanced braking systems.

The Neta X is designed for comfort and practicality. It features a double-decker trunk with up to one thousand three hundred eighty-eight liters of space when the second row of seats is folded. Its interior combines both style and functionality.
For a premium experience, the Neta X offers luxurious interior options, impressive performance metrics, and a long cruising range, making it stand out in its segment.
With its sleek design, powerful motor, and cutting-edge safety features, the Neta X redefines what a sporty SUV can offer. It’s the perfect combination of performance and comfort.

responses: The Neta S is an innovative sports electric vehicle with an impressive NEDC range of one thousand one hundred kilometers. It features active air suspension, L4 autonomous driving in some scenarios, and a high-pressure fast charging system that can provide one hundred fifty kilometers of range in just five minutes.

The Neta S stands out as a smart BEV sports car, accelerating from zero to one hundred kilometers per hour in under three point nine seconds. It excels in the Moose Test at speeds above eighty kilometers per hour, showcasing its superior stability and handling.

Equipped with intelligent driving features, the Neta S includes NCP city navigation, a powerful MDC six-ten computing platform, two laser radars, five millimeter-wave radars, and eleven cameras, all contributing to a safer and more efficient driving experience.

The Neta S boasts a luxurious and futuristic interior, featuring a panoramic thermal insulation skylight, a twelve point three-inch passenger screen, and an augmented reality HUD (AR-HUD) system. It also offers a premium sound experience with a seven hundred twenty-degree surround sound system.

Safety is top-notch with the Neta S, which includes intelligent security features and multiple layers of redundancy. It is designed for high-performance driving, with a wind resistance coefficient as low as zero point one two six and advanced suspension for a smooth and dynamic ride.

This model comes in several configurations, including the one thousand one hundred kilometers range extended version, the seven hundred fifteen laser radar version, and the seven hundred fifteen long battery life version, catering to a variety of customer preferences.

With its two thousand nine hundred eighty millimeter wheelbase, the Neta S offers spacious interiors that exceed expectations in its segment. The car integrates cutting-edge technology and elegant design, making it a standout choice for premium electric vehicle enthusiasts.

responses: The Kuayue Chana V5D is a pure electric vehicle with a seating capacity of eleven. It has dimensions of four thousand four hundred ninety-five by one thousand six hundred eighty by one thousand nine hundred ninety millimeters and a wheelbase of two thousand nine hundred thirty millimeters. The maximum speed is one hundred kilometers per hour, with an endurance mileage of three hundred kilometers, making it suitable for various purposes.

The Kuayue Chana V5D is equipped with a CATL battery offering a capacity of forty-one point eighty-six kWh and a peak motor power of fifty kW. It supports normal charging at six point six kW and uses Chinese-type charging, providing reliability and efficiency.

This model comes with advanced safety features like dual airbags and ABS, along with modern conveniences such as electric windows, central locking, and optional configurations like rear-view cameras and aluminum wheels.

The Kuayue Chana V5D has a gross vehicle weight of two thousand six hundred kilograms and a kerb weight of one thousand five hundred forty kilograms. It also includes front disc and rear drum brakes, a ground clearance of one hundred eighty millimeters, and durable one hundred ninety-five sixty-five R15 tires.

With its practical design, the Kuayue Chana V5D offers features like independent suspension, LED daytime running lights, and advanced driver aids such as tire pressure monitoring system (TPMS) and electric power steering (EPS), ensuring both functionality and safety for its users.

responses: You can contact CG Motors at their corporate office in Sanepa, Lalitpur, Nepal. The NETA showroom is located at Thapathali, Kathmandu, and the CG KYC & Kinglong showroom is in Panipokhari. For inquiries regarding NETA vehicles, call zero one-five-nine-seven-zero-one-seven-four, nine-eight-two-zero-one-zero-five-zero-five-five, or nine-eight-zero-two-three-four-one-eight-two-zero. For CG KYC & Kinglong, call nine-eight-zero-two-three-four-zero-nine-four-six or nine-eight-zero-one-four-six-two-eight-two-three. The corporate office of CG Motors is located in Sanepa, Lalitpur. Showrooms include the NETA showroom at Thapathali, Kathmandu, and the CG KYC & Kinglong showroom at Panipokhari.
For any assistance, you can contact CG Motors via email at info@cgmotors.com.np or by phone. Toll-free support is available at one-six-six-zero-zero-one-one-one-two-six-nine.
CG Motors' service center is located in Hattiban, Lalitpur. For detailed assistance, you can also contact them at info@cgmotors.com.np.
